title: Good lighting. Part 2
creator_credit: Centre for Educational Television Overseas and Peter Combes
brief_description: Continues the discussion of lighting commenced in Part 1. Unwanted shadows are demonstrated and the difference between a “hard” and “soft” shadow explained. The elimination of such shadows is shown. The three light arrangement is extended to four, and the “modified three light arrangement”. The latter is extended to cover a large studio area. Also covers lighting of the discussion set. Presented by Bob Holness.
